uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique identity for this identity object.

label.title: Label
label.description: Optional label useful for non-standard identities to give a bit more context.

type.title: Type
type.description:
The type of Code being represented and usually specific for
a particular context, country, or tax regime.

code.title: Code
code.description: The actual value of the identity code.

Identity.description: Identity is used to define a code for a specific context.
